page.title: 07A LOCAL HOUSE
page.content:
9,NORWOOD AVENUE
I LIVE IN A{SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE}IN {ASTLEY.}THE HOUSE IS A{COUNCIL HOUSE AND AN OLD ONE AT THAT. IT HAS A SHED ROUND THE BACK AND NEAR THE BOTTOM OF THE GARDEN IS A CONCRETE POLE ON WHICH A ROPE IS FASTENED TO HANG THE WASHING ON. NEAR THE{WASHING POLE}IS A BIG TREE. {UPSTAIRS}WE HAVE GOT{3 BEDROOMS}AND A{BATHROOM.}FROM THE FRONT BEDROOM YOU GET AN EXCELLENT VIEW OF PEOPLE STANDING AT THE FRONT DOOR.{DOWNSTAIRS THERE ARE 2{ROOMS - A LIVING ROOM}AND A{KITCHEN. NEARLY ALL THE HOUSES IN{NORWOOD {AVENUE}ARE{COUNCIL HOUSES}BUT UP NEAR THE TOP OF THE ROAD ARE{OLD PEOPLE'S {BUNGALOWS.
